amendment.description: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to ensure that nonimmigrant visas are not issued to individuals with connections to terrorism or who intend to carry out terrorist activities in the United States.

action.text: Amendment SA 3926 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3926.

Amendment SA 3926 proposed by Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S10224-10225; text: CR S10224-10225) To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to ensure that nonimmigrant visas are not issued to individuals with connections to terrorism or who intend to carry out terrorist activities in the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3926 proposed by Senator Kyl.
